ref.div: Bedeir, Y. H., Schumaier, A. P., Abu-Sheasha, G. & Grawe, B. M. Type 2 retear after arthroscopic single-row, double-row and suture bridge rotator cuff repair: a systematic review. European journal of orthopaedic surgery & traumatology: orthopedie traumatologie, 10.1007/s00590-018-2306-8 (2018).
